\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
{A_1} \& {A_2} \& {A_3} \& {\,} \\
{A_1} \& {B_2} \& E \& {\,} \\
\& {C_2} \& {C_2} \\
\& {\,} \& {\,}
\arrow["{f_A}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
\arrow["{g_A}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
\arrow["{m_2}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
\arrow["{\delta _{r1}}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
\arrow["x"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow["{m_2 f_A}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
\arrow["y"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
\arrow["{n_2}", from=2-2, to=3-2]
\arrow["\eta"', from=2-3, to=2-4]
\arrow["z"', from=2-3, to=3-3]
\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\arrow["{\delta _{c2}}", from=3-2, to=4-2]
\arrow["\varepsilon"', from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
